00021 #ifndef __MR_KERN_LOGGING_C
00022 #define __MR_KERN_LOGGING_C
00023 
00024 #include "mrKernLogging.h"
00025 
00026 /**************************************************************************************************
00027  */
00028 //#define MR_KERN_DEBUG KERN_INFO
00029 #define MR_KERN_DEBUG KERN_DEBUG
00030 
00031 #define LOG_BUFFER_SIZE 1024
00032 #define LOG_FILE_NAME_MAX_LENGTH 100
00033 #define DEFAULT_LOG_PREFIX "dcsc: "
00034 
00035 const char* g_mrLogPrefix=DEFAULT_LOG_PREFIX;
00036 //u16 g_logflags=LOG_FLAG_ALL;
00037 u16 g_logflags=LOG_ERROR|LOG_WARNING|LOG_INFO|LOG_OPEN_CLOSE;
00038 char g_logfilename[LOG_FILE_NAME_MAX_LENGTH]="";
00039 #ifndef NODEBUG
00040 //int mrLogMessage(const char* origin, u16 logflag, const char *fmt, ...)
00041 int mrlogmessage(u16 logflag, const char *fmt, ...)
00042 {
00043     va_list args;
00044     int tgtLen;
00045     static char logBuffer[LOG_BUFFER_SIZE];
00046     int iBufferSize=LOG_BUFFER_SIZE;
00047     char* tgtBuffer=logBuffer;
00048     const char* srcFmt=fmt;
00049 
00050     // is there a kernel log level string? copy it first
00051     if (fmt[0]=='<' && fmt[1]>='0' && fmt[1]<='7' && fmt[2]=='>') {
00052       *tgtBuffer++=*srcFmt++;
00053       *tgtBuffer++=*srcFmt++;
00054       *tgtBuffer++=*srcFmt++;
00055       iBufferSize-=3;
00056     }
00057 
00058     tgtLen = snprintf(tgtBuffer, iBufferSize, g_mrLogPrefix); // add logging prefix
00059     if (tgtLen>=0) {
00060       tgtBuffer+=tgtLen; iBufferSize-=tgtLen;
00061       va_start(args, fmt);
00062       tgtLen = vsnprintf(tgtBuffer, iBufferSize, srcFmt, args);
00063       if (tgtLen>0) {
00064         tgtBuffer+=tgtLen;
00065         if (tgtLen<LOG_BUFFER_SIZE-1) {
00066           *tgtBuffer++='\n'; // add newline if space in buffer
00067         }
00068         *tgtBuffer=0; // terminate the buffer
00069         if (((g_logflags&LOG_FLAG_ALL_LEVELS)&logflag)>0 &&    // check the log level
00070         ((logflag&~LOG_FLAG_ALL_LEVELS)==0                 // no specific bit set 
00071          || ((g_logflags&~LOG_FLAG_ALL_LEVELS)&logflag)>0) // check the specific bit
00072         ) {
00073           // print if logflag matches
00074           printk(logBuffer);
00075         }
00076       }
00077     }
00078     return tgtLen;
00079 }
00080 
00081 // so far variable arguments doesnt seem to work
00082 /* int mrlogmessage(u16 logflag, const char *fmt, ...) */
00083 /* { */
00084 /*   return mrLogMessage(NULL, logflag, fmt, __VA_ARGS__); */
00085 /* } */
00086 #endif //NODEBUG
00087 
00088 void mrAddLogPrefix(const char* logprefix, const char* origin) {
00089   g_mrLogPrefix=logprefix;
00090 }
00091 
00092 u16 mrSetLogFilter(u16 filter) {
00093   g_logflags=filter;
00094   return  g_logflags;
00095 }
00096 
00097 #endif //__MR_KERN_LOGGING_C
